name: Nemo Quasar Insulated 3D Double Sleeping Pad
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
This contoured pad cradles you and your partner as you sleep. Body-mapped baffles gently curve around your core, allowing your head and shoulders relax on a neutral plain. This baffled design provides excellent support for side-sleepers and helps keep you centered on the pad. Primaloft® synthetic insulation puts a layer of cozy between you and the cold ground.Body-mapped baffles offer next level support and comfort.Raised head area helps on uneven ground and adds loft at the head.Lined with 100% recycled Primaloft insulation.Laylow™ zero profile valve makes for fast set-up, precise adjustments and rapid deflation.Vortex™ high-capacity pump sack makes inflation even faster.Recycled ripstop polyester fabric helps reduce the chance of punctures.Includes a Vortex pump sack, Velcro strap, repair kit and a drawstring stuff sack.Covered by Nemo’s lifetime warranty.

        Sustainability
